creator: Super Speed.
descriptionHtml:
🔥 Combined with Antivirus, Safe Browsing, Message Security, Notification Blocker, iSecurity is a FREE super security tool. iSecurity not only provides users virus protection but also offers service to protect user’s privacy. Install iSecurity and keep your Android device away from hacking, viruses and malware.

===iSecurity Highlights===
⭐ World-leading virus database: Get intelligent diagnosis and ensure your device security with one-tap scan.
⭐ Privacy protection: Protect your device 24/7 real–time protection with ‘Safe Browsing’‘AppLock’’WiFi Security’ and ‘Message Security’.
⭐ Optimize phone performance: Clean useless junk files precisely and gain more space.
🔥 iSecurity = Free Antivirus + Phone Security Guard + AppLocker + Cleaner + Game Booster

===iSecurity Key Features===

✔️ Super Virus Cleaner
Powered by world leading virus database, iSecurity offers the most professional antivirus service. iSecurity will 100% prevent your Android device from any threat, malware, trojan or extortion virus. Scan and kill malicious viruses effectively. Scan and keep your phone more secure.

✔️ Super Safe Browsing
Want to view some websites and do not want to leave any trace? iSecurity will be your good choice! View everything you like under safe browsing mode like video, novel, music and feel no worry about leaving any trace. All the history, cookies and sessions will be erased completely at exit.

✔️ WiFi Security
WiFi security is a super useful tool when you connect to free WiFi in public places such as restaurant, coffee shop, hotel and so on. WiFi security will search and list useful WiFi for you, it will also detect the ARP, DNS and SSL security before connecting. Also, iSecurity will alert you when WiFi risks found.

✔️ AppLock
Did you have the embarrassing experience that your friend borrowed your phone and view your gallery or instant message? With AppLock you can lock the private apps to keep your privacy from leaking out. Lock apps with password & pattern and stay away from the embarrassing moments!

✔️ Message Security
With Message Security of iSecurity, your private message will be hidden to specific message box and will not pop up in public anymore. Enable message security and protect your secret message from peeing up by others.

===We also provide===

⚜️ Super Junk Cleaner
Gain more space with one-tap scan. Find and delete useless files completely of your Android device.

🚀 Super Memory Booster
Too many apps running background will lag your phone. iSecurity will find and disable the app which occupied too much memory. Improve your phone speed with iSecurity.

🎲 Game Booster
High Ping when playing your favorite game? iSecurity will help to optimize your phone and boost your game. Just install iSecurity and get a smoother game experience.

☢️ Super CPU Cooler
iSecurity can scan your CPU status and temperature, find overheating apps and close them. Cool and leave your phone along for 30s, then CPU status will reach the best condition.

🔋 Battery Saver
Run out of phone power in a short time? iSecurity can help you close inactive applications which run at the background. It is the simplest way to keep your battery healthy by stopping power-consuming apps and monitoring battery status.

🌐Data Monitor
Stop worrying about wasting money when too much mobile data is used without any alert. Try this brand new feature now. Data Monitor feature will accurately track how much data you have used and get you alerts before you run out of data.

_______________________________
iSecurity will keep your information secure and will never share it with the third party according to the Privacy and Cookies Policy.

⭐ World-leading virus cleaner: Get intelligent diagnosis and ensure your device security with one-tap scan.

⭐ Optimize phone performance: Clean useless junk files precisely and gain more space.
🔥 iSecurity = Free Antivirus + Phone Security Guard + AppLocker + Cleaner

===iSecurity Key Features===

✔️ Super Virus Cleaner
Powered by world leading virus database, iSecurity offers the most professional antivirus service. As a professional virus cleaner, iSecurity will 100% prevent your Android device from any threat, malware, trojan or extortion virus. Scan and kill malicious viruses effectively. Scan and keep your phone more secure.

✔️ Super Safe Browsing
Want to view some websites and do not want to leave any trace? iSecurity will be your good choice! View everything you like under safe browsing mode and no worry about leaving any trace. All the history and cookies will be erased completely at exit.

✔️ WiFi Security
WiFi security is a super useful tool when you connect to public WiFi such as restaurant, coffee shop and hotel. WiFi security will search and list useful WiFi for you, it also detects the ARP, DNS and SSL security before connecting. Also, iSecurity will alert you when risks found.

✔️ AppLock
Did you have an embarrassing experience that a friend borrowed your phone and view your gallery or messages? With AppLock, lock the private apps to keep your privacy from leaking out. Lock apps with password & pattern and stay away from the awkward moments!

✔️ Message Security
With Message Security of iSecurity, your private messages will be hidden to specific message box and will not pop up in public anymore. Enable message security and protect your messages from peeing up by others.

===We also provide===

⚜️ Super Junk Cleaner
Besides virus cleaner, you can gain more space with one-tap clean. Find and delete useless files completely.

🚀 Super Memory Booster
Too many apps running background will lag your phone. iSecurity can find and disable the app which occupied too much memory. Improve your phone speed with iSecurity.

🎲 Game Booster
High Ping when playing your favorite game? iSecurity helps to optimize your phone and boost your games. Come and get a smoother game experience.

☢️ CPU Cooler
iSecurity can scan your CPU status and temperature, find overheating apps and close them. Cool and leave your phone along for 30s, then CPU status will reach a better condition.

🔋 Battery Saver
Run out of phone power in a short time? iSecurity can help you close inactive applications which run at the background.

🌐Data Monitor
Stop worrying about wasting money when too much mobile data is used without any alert. Data Monitor feature will accurately track how much data you have used and get you alerts before you run out of data.
